MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 postcode area of Rhostyllen affecting properties in Bronwylfa Road and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to broken equipment on the overhead network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:28am on 12th February 2021.
